attributes.action: Label and Logo on Food produced in Occupied Israeli Territories
attributes.additional_details:
Israel is breaking International law as it continues to establish illegal settlements in Palestine

Dear reader,
If it is recognised as ‘illegally occupied’ internationally, then why are we eating from it?
Why are we promoting this illegal occupation?

The government itself has issued warnings.Guidance published (3/12/13) by UKTI says there are "clear risks related to economic and financial activities in the settlements,and we do not encourage or offer support to such activity". Further,be aware of "potential reputational implications" of involvement in Israeli settlements.(https://goo.gl/qMpT9O)

We urge the government to create a new food label/logo with a simple 4 letter acronym; FIOT.
Allowing CLEAR indication of Food produced in Occupied Israeli Territories.

We, the British, have protested in out masses against this illegal occupation. Please take a minute to sign the petition.I thank you on behalf of those who are occupied.

Let’s eat consciously TOGETHER!
